summary: An internal FBI email chain from November 12, 2020, notifying personnel about press presence at the FBI Miami office related to an OPR (Office of Professional Responsibility) briefing concerning Epstein victims. The email serves as a heads-up for potential media inquiries.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: The sender of the internal email from the FBI New York Child Exploitation/Human Trafficking unit, notifying colleagues about press activity at the FBI Miami office regarding an Epstein OPR victim briefing.

events.title: Epstein OPR Victim Briefing at FBI Miami
events.description: An Office of Professional Responsibility (OPR) briefing concerning Epstein victims was scheduled to occur at the FBI Miami office, attracting press attention on site.

keyFacts: On November 12, 2020, press was present at the FBI Miami office regarding an Epstein-related OPR victim briefing.
The email indicates ongoing internal FBI activity and review (OPR) related to the Epstein case years after his death.
The communication shows coordination between FBI offices (New York and Miami) regarding media attention on the case.
